login_css.body::after: background: url(./img/MonkvissionBackground.png); background-size: cover; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-repeat: no-repeat;
login_css..langbox: top: max(560px, calc(100vh - 40px)); right: 40px; color: white;
login_css..advtextbox > p: font-weight: 400; font-family: 'Raleway'; font-size: smaller; background-color: #ffffff; color: black; border-radius: 10px; padding: 10px 5px 10px 5px; width: 120px; left: calc(50% - 60px); margin-top: 30px;
login_css.span#signin: top: 40px; right: 100px; position: absolute; font-size: 0.8em; font-weight: 500; color: #ffffff;

en.title: Monkvision Dashboards
en.loginsubtag: World's only enterprise-wide AI based active monitorting solution.

register_css.body::after: background: url(./img/MonkvissionBackground.png); background-size: cover; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-repeat: no-repeat;
register_css..lgbox: top: max(80px, 25%); left: max(400px, calc(70% - 160px)); width: 320px; background-color: #ffffff; border-radius: 20px; box-shadow: -2px 6px 53px -23px rgba(0,0,0,0.75); padding: 10px 20px 10px 20px; font-size: smaller; padding-right: 40px;
register_css..langbox: top: max(560px, calc(100vh - 40px)); right: 40px; color: white;
register_css..advtextbox > p: font-weight: 400; font-family: 'Raleway'; font-size: smaller; background-color: #ffffff; color: black; border-radius: 10px; padding: 10px 5px 10px 5px; width: 120px; left: calc(50% - 60px); margin-top: 30px;
register_css.span#signin: top: 40px; right: 100px; position: absolute; font-size: 0.8em; font-weight: 500; color: #ffffff;

en.title: Monkvision Dashboards
en.loginsubtag: World's only enterprise-wide AI based active monitorting solution.

main_css.div#container: background-color: #1e1e1e; border-top-left-radius: 20px; left: 64px; width: calc(100% - 64px); color: rgba(250,250,250,0.95);
main_css.div#maincontent: top: 65px; width: calc(95vw - 60px); height: calc(100vh - 65px); left: 30px;
main_css.div#leftheader: z-index: 2; align-items:center; width: 70px; background-color: #024086db; padding-top: 30px; word-break: break-word;
main_css.div#leftheader > img.dashicon: border: 0.5px solid #45d19e0d; height: 40px; width: 40px; left: 0px; padding: 5px;margin-bottom: 2px;
main_css.div#leftheader > img.dashicon:hover: left: 0px; padding: 5px;margin-bottom: 2px; border-radius: 5px; border-width: 0.7px; border-style: solid; border-color: white;
main_css.div#leftheader > img.dashicon.selected: left: 0px; padding: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; border-style: solid; border-radius: 5px; border-width: 0.7px; border-color: rgba(250,250,250,0.95);
main_css.span#header: top: 15px; left: 30px; color: #41cf70; width: calc(100% - 30px); font-family: 'Raleway';
main_css.div#leftheader > span: color: rgba(250,250,250,0.95); padding-bottom: 30px; width: 70px; left: 0px; font-size: smaller; font-weight: 500;
main_css.span#header > span#title: width: 300px; font-size: 0.85em; font-weight: bold; background-color: #505050ad; box-shadow: 0 0 1px #50505045; border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px; color: rgba(250,250,250,0.95);
main_css.span#header > span#showtimer: font-weight: bold; background-color: #505050ad; box-shadow: 0 0 1px #50505045; border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px; color: rgba(250,250,250,0.95);
main_css.input#datetimepickerfrom, input#datetime: font-size: 0.8em; font-family: sans-serif; background-color: rgb(80,80,80); color: rgba(250,250,250,0.95); border-radius: 4px; box-shadow: 0 0 1px #50505045; padding: 4px; border-style: none;

en.title: Monkvision Dashboards
en.title_dash5: Primary Prod cluster - monitored by MonBoss
en.title_dash8: Secondary Prod cluster - monitored by MonBoss
en.clusterAvailSpaceSQL: AVAILABLE DISK SPACE (for DBs, in GB)
en.network_max_tx_trend: NETWORK OUTBOUND(Tx) ACROSS CLUSTER, in KB/sec
en.network_max_rx_trend: NETWORK INBOUND(Rx) ACROSS CLUSTER, in KB/sec
en.ram_swap_max_trend: RAM SWAP USAGE ACROSS CLUSTER, in %

main_html_data.span-with-menu#gear: styleBody='div.menuitem{color: rgba(80,80,80,0.9)} div.menuitem:hover{background: rgba(80,80,80,0.9) !important; color: rgba(250,250,250,0.95) !important;} span#content > img:hover{filter: brightness(70%);transition: all 1s ease;} div#menu{margin-left: -120px;}'

pdf_report_css.input#datetimepickerfrom, input#datetime: font-size: 0.8em; font-family: sans-serif; color: rgba(0,0,0,0.75);border-radius: 4px; box-shadow: 0 0 1px rgba(34, 25, 25, 0.4); padding: 2px; border-style: none; pointer-events: none;
pdf_report_css.div#pdf-preview-maincontent: top: 120px; width: calc(95vw - 100px); height: calc(100vh - 120px); left: 100px;
pdf_report_css.@media print: div#pdf-preview-container {display: none;} div#pdf-preview-maincontent{top: unset; width: 100vw; height: 100vh; left: unset;}
